title: I've missed you.
text:
I've missed you,
the taste of your body, the feel of your touch.
I've missed you, how your arms feel around me,
and the smell of your hair.
I am not complete, your absence making me feel empty
longing for your strength, and your reassurance.

for your warm inviting smile...
I'll wait forever for you, my dear

Please don't make me wait much longer...I have no more tears to let flow
and I slowly loose hope...

Unicorn.
